price: 35. (Cadaab)kaasi waxaad ku mudateen inaad ka dhigateen Aayadahii Ilaahay jees-jees, noloshii adduunka baana idin hodday. Marka Maanta lagama soo saarayo halkaa, lagamana yeelayo cudur daarasho.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّكُمُ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوٗا وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡرَجُونَ مِنۡهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum bi-annakumu ittakhadhtum āyāti al-lahi huzuwan wagharratkumu al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā fal-yawma lā yukh'rajūna min'hā walā hum yus'taʿtabūna
